applications.name: 美味厨房
applications.description:
Become the best chef in the #1 puzzle game on the Appstore!
Match ingredients to cook the most delicious dishes in this succulent brain journey across worldwide cuisine.
Go through over 70 levels and get cooking now!

Puzzle Chef is a game in which you must prepare the most appetising dishes by combining their ingredients. Need to bake an apple tart?
It's simple! Regroup the apples together on your board, then the pastry dough, and finally some vanilla icecream... And there you have it!

Puzzle Chef is user friendly and intuitive. Learn fast, and with ease!
All you have to do is slide the ingredients on your board and match
three or more of the same ingredients together horizontally or vertically!
You may move the ingredients freely around the board!

Puzzle Chef also has:
*Over 50 recipes from around the world! Love French, Japanese, American or Italian food?
With Puzzle Chef, there is something for everyone!"
*Appetising and delicious graphics! Yum! Who hasn't ever wanted a slice from such a chocolate fondant?
*Chain reactions and boosters to multiply your score!
*Three mouth-watering game modes: cook a dish, clean your board, prepare a full course menu
*Bombs to set off by multiplying combos!
*Connect to Facebook and "cook" with friends

Interested in finding us on Puzzle Chef? Start your fantastic culinary adventure today!

Already a fan of Puzzle Chef? Be sure to visit our savory Facebook page, or follow us on
Twitter to stay up to date with everything Puzzle Chef!

https://www.facebook.com/PuzzleChefGame
https://twitter.com/PuzzleChefEN

~~Puzzle Chef is a free game, although some elements may require payment.
You may deactivate the integrated in-app payment option through your smartphone settings.

Puzze Chef is a gumi Europe game
http://gumi-europe.com/en/
applications.releaseNotes:
Delicious new version:

*Freshly cooked new bonus candies! Try to get some boosters to taste them!
*Tuned game experience to improve our recipes!
*Met our Fox in a brand new trailer!

Join him, the adventure has just begun!

applications.name: 生命传奇:冰玫瑰
applications.description:
Try this immersive, high-quality game for FREE! Then continue on with a ONE TIME unlock and play offline!
NO VIRTUAL ITEMS, NO INTERRUPTIONS… you’ll OWN this game for life.

Your husband, novelist Edward Grand, disappears soon after leaving to investigate the town of Rosemount. All you can do is follow him. What you find is a deserted town, frozen under the Ice Queen’s spell.

•RESCUE YOUR BELOVED FROM THE ICE QUEEN!
With each step you take, the Ice Queen stands in your way. Discover the truth behind her desire to keep Edward hidden from you.

•EXPLORE A FROZEN WORLD
Rosemount is both beautiful and dangerous, buried under a layer of ice and snow. Discover all its secrets as you search for Edward.

•BRING SPRING TO A LAND OF WINTER
In order to defeat the snow queen, you must thaw out the people and locations along your journey.

•UNLOCK THE SECRETS OF ROSEMOUNT WITH THIS COLLECTOR’S EDITION!
Reveal more of your story in the bonus game. Experience the beautiful concept art and wallpapers in this amazing Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure.

*** Discover more from Big Fish! ***

Check out our entire game library with our Big Fish Games app and get European Mystery: Scent of Desire Collector's Edition absolutely FREE here: http://bigfi.sh/BigFishGamesApp

Sign up for our newsletter and never miss a new release or promotion again: http://bigfi.sh/iSplashNewsletter

Big Fish is the leading global marketplace to discover and enjoy casual games. You can enjoy our virtually endless selection of games anytime, anywhere — on your PC, Mac, mobile phone, or tablet. Learn more at bigfishgames.com!

Become a fan on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/BigFishGames

Follow us on Twitter: http://bigfi.sh/BigFishTwitter

applications.name: 火拼外星人
applications.description: 横版过关跑酷游戏，控制宇航员前进并消灭外星人。

applications.name: 鲨鱼向前冲
applications.description: 中文休闲闯关游戏，在有限次数内抛射吃光所有鸭子。
applications.releaseNotes:
- 新增无限万灵药！
- 全新水体闪光效果
- 内含新Gameloft LIVE!
- 改进了New iPad上的字体显示
- 调整了部分关卡的难度

applications.name: 星际射手
applications.description:
One man's junk is another man's galactic battleship... 

In this addictive arcade-style twin stick space shooter, you (a disgruntled waste collector) salvage the debris from each round of your destructive rampage to piece by piece transform your humble space-garbage-truck into a starship worthy of your cause.

Build increasingly better ships to unleash powerful weapons and gadgetry -- lasers, giant ball-and-chains, anti-gravity orbs, heat seeking missiles, magnets, freeze rays and more -- against endless waves of enemies and huge, modular bosses. 

You'll never survive. But if you're going down, you're taking as many of them with you as you can. See how long you can continue the anarchy!
applications.releaseNotes:
Big update! New content as well as fixes.

Added:
- Leaderboards
- New control options
- New ship parts
- New enemies
- New achievements
- One-off bonuses
- Rewards for referring friends

Tweaks:
- Harder bosses
- New enemies
- Turned off friendly-fire for red super mode
- Garage stats are more accurate
- More accurate achievement progress info

Fixes:
- All achievements are now possible

applications.name: 小兔纸
applications.description: 问世间最卖萌为何物，非“兔纸”莫属，可爱的兔子追逐游戏，你一定会喜欢！今天，有一只Tiny Rabbit想要追逐极光，发明了胡萝卜驱动的火箭，快来帮它实现愿望吧，不过要避开敌人或者烂掉的胡萝卜哦！
applications.releaseNotes: - Small bug fixes to improve performance

applications.name: 色彩填充
applications.description:
Slick geometry game for the iPhone. A modern take of the classic Qix arcade game. Simple, fresh and addictive gameplay!

-40 different puzzles from easy to really challenging
-5 different types of enemies each with its unique behavior
-5 different power-ups
-18 achievements and more coming soon..
applications.releaseNotes:
- Adjusted Levels difficulty
- Modified particle effects
- Added a new Pause menu with resume, restart and quit options

applications.name: 极限投掷
applications.description: -> Offered for only $0.99 until 1:st of December <-One of the classics, re-invented for your favorite device.Yatzy is a highly addictive roll-the-dice game for your iPad/iPhone. You can choose between Yatzy and Maxi Yatzy.Simple, intuitive and massively fun, Yatzy is easy to learn, but difficult to master. Constantly providing new challenges, its crip design will allow you to enjoy yourself for hours, over and over again. It's time you show your friends that they are running out of luck!The free version of the game offers the following features:• Crisp graphics and sounds effects• History of all games• Statistics• Left and right hand user support• Local multiplayer mode• Game instructions• Ad free
applications.releaseNotes:
* Search for your friends who are already playing Yatzy Ultimate and send them buddy requests
* Make new Yatzy friends from all over the world and send them buddy requests after a great online match
* See who’s online from your buddy list and invite them to play with you

applications.name: 圆环生存
applications.description:
*******FREE introductory price! Limited time only!*******

Orbsorb is an original central defence arcade game about focus, control and high scores.

Defend your Orbsorber from incoming, different coloured ORBs. Gain points for defence and even more points for letting the same coloured ORBs pass by your shield. Try to keep control and focus as ORB numbers increase, ORBs quicken and special ORB attacks bombard your Orbsorber. 

Use a classic joystick style control scheme to achieve endless high scores. As you learn to keep calm and stay focused, control and precision will be your greatest advantage. 

MAIN FEATURES:

- Universal app for iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch.
- Endless gameplay with endless combinations.
- Colourful and clean design.
- Original atmospheric techno soundtrack.
- Game Center achievements and leaderboards.
- Created with Sprite Kit.
- Optimised for iPhone 5, 5C & 5S. 
- Requires iOS 7.0 or above.

CREDITS:

Code, Design & Art - Montgomery Guilhaus 
Music & Sound Effects - Rebecca Guilhaus
applications.releaseNotes:
ORBSORB UPDATE 1.1:

- New tutorial option in the side menu explaining how to play the game.
- New visual assist option in the side menu to highlight similar coloured ORBs.
- Gameplay optimisation and tweaking.
- Improved game performance.
- Fixed crash after game was played multiple times.  
- Fixed crash when a large number of ORBs are visible on the screen.
- Game Center achievement improvements.
- Minor audio adjustments.

Thanks to everyone that suggested improvements and informed me of game bugs and glitches! I will consider any and all game feature suggestions!

applications.name: 拯救方块
applications.description: 非常有趣的益智解谜类游戏，玩家的目标是将大脑（粉色方块）放在画面当中，引诱被感染的方块向粉色方块移动，让被感染的殭尸方块落入陷阱当中，使用关卡中限定数量的大脑方块解决所有的僵尸方块以完成关卡，而完成的速度越快，就能取得越高的关卡分数。游戏提供 48 个关卡挑战，喜欢就来试试吧！
applications.releaseNotes:
Meet Save the Cubes 2.0!

We've added in huge graphics improvements. New zombies and new christmas hats for levels 37 and up! Plus we added higher quality textures and nicer particles :)

Updated to fit the iPhone 5 and iPad Air displays. Better universal support as well.

Don't forget the stylish new icon!
Thanks for sticking with us!
